shortDescription: Expressions for generating Perlin and simplex noise values (2D or 3D). Useful for procedural generation.
name: Noise
tags: perlin noise, simplex noise, procedural generation
description:
Expressions for generating Perlin and simplex noise values (2D or 3D). Useful for procedural generation.

For example, you can use the results from the noise expressions to create objects at specific positions. This allows to generate a pseudo-random world. By saving the *"seed"* and setting it again later, you can regenerate the same pseudo-random world.
